mapper.select: SELECT mbr_id, mbr_cd, mbr_nm, mbr_pw, mbr_nicknm, mbr_telno, mbr_addr, mbr_daddr, mbr_zip, mbr_eml, mbr_birth, mbr_join_ymdt, mbr_mdfcn_ymdt FROM member WHERE mbr_cd=#{memberCode};
mapper.update: UPDATE member set mbr_nm = #{memberName}, mbr_nicknm = #{memberNickname}, mbr_telno = #{memberTelNo}, mbr_addr = #{memberAddress}, mbr_daddr = #{memberDAddress}, mbr_zip = #{memberZip}, mbr_eml = #{memberEmail}, mbr_birth = #{memberBirth}, mbr_mdfcn_ymdt = curdate() where mbr_cd= #{memberCode};
mapper.select: select os.os_cd, e.mbr_cd, e.ent_cd, os.os_ttl, os.os_expln, os.os_reg_ymdt from enterprise e inner join outsourcing os on e.ent_cd = os.ent_cd where e.mbr_cd = #{memberCode} ORDER BY os.os_reg_ymdt DESC limit 10;
select COUNT(*) from outsourcing_contract oc inner join enterprise e on oc.ent_cd = e.ent_cd where e.mbr_cd = #{_parameter};

select p.prtf_cd, p.ent_cd, p.prtf_ttl, p.prtf_cn, p.prtf_reg_ymdt, e.mbr_cd from portfolio p inner join enterprise e on p.ent_cd = e.ent_cd where e.mbr_cd = #{memberCode} ORDER BY p.prtf_reg_ymdt DESC limit 10;
select count(*) from outsourcing_contract_details ocd inner join enterprise e on ocd.ent_cd = e.ent_cd where ocd.stc_cd = 'SD_BEFORE' and e.mbr_cd = #{memberCode};

select count(DISTINCT op.ocd_cd) from outsourcing_prograss op inner join outsourcing_contract_details ocd on op.ocd_cd = ocd.ocd_cd inner join enterprise e on ocd.ent_cd = e.ent_cd where op.stc_cd <> 'SD_COMPLETION' and e.mbr_cd = #{memberCode};
